message: Hi guys! I'm looking for a GTD service able to sync on my Mac and my iPhone. Any advice?
I create a note in evernote for my ToDo list. I also have a shopping list in the same app.
Toodledo. Sync to iOS and the web. You can also have notes in addition to todo list all in 1 app.
TaskPaper
I use Omnifocus which is the most powerful and complete GTD solution. But you will have to dish out some dough
+1 for OmniFocus, it's very powerful but does come with a price. For a less expensive option (free) check out Wunderlist http://www.6wunderkinder.com/wunderlist/
iProcrastinate
I use Evernote as well. It works well syncs across all your computers and devices and it's free.
Wunderlist is awesome. Simple, easy to use and they are continually adding features and support. If you need to sync across multiple devices and platforms, it's a winner.
OmniFocus. You don't have to learn all the GTD stuff to realize just how powerful and helpful it really is.
Wunderlist is what you're looking for
I use SpringPad http://springpadit.com/home
+1 TaskPaper
It's not for hardcore GTD fans, but I find the Due app sweet and simple.
Thanks everyone. OmniFocus is to expensive for a simple GTD app. I will try Wunderlist!
Take a look at rememberthemilk.com. Simple to use and yet powerful.
Wunderlist is indeed beautifully designed but it doesn't have recurring functionality. Yet.
Been using Things since its early preview. Probably not everyone's cup of tea, but it works so far for me.
I like Wunderlist too, simple as I need it
I am another fan of Wunderlist
Toodledo is pretty nice, regularly updated, has recurring functionality, and syncs across the Web and devices.

Save up your money and get OmniFocus (unless it really is overkill for what you need). I'm in the free 14-day trial right now with the Mac version and have already bought the iPhone app, and I already know it is going to replace my copies of Things I've been (half-assed) using for a couple years.
Check out http://www.notifymecloud.com/ it is the best GTD app and i tried them all.
